doc:
George Hertzberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Hertzberg 0 George Hertzberg (born November 6, 1972) is an American actor best known for his portrayal of the cyber-demonic soldier Adam in the fourth season of the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer. Hertzberg, who was born in Glens Falls, New York, has made appearances in several television shows, including 3rd Rock from the Sun and That's My Bush!, and wrote and produced the movie Too Much Magic. George_Hertzberg ( born November_6_,_1972 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_portrayal of the_cyber-demonic_soldier_Adam in the_fourth_season of the_television_series_Buffy the_Vampire_Slayer .
